name: Root of my Heart
description:
Have you ever wanted to get to know anthropomorphic trees, perhaps even get to date them? 

...If so, why? Why is this something you've thought about...? But anyhow, you're in luck! Here's a tree dating simulator. 

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 ( https://globalgamejam.org/ )

Credits

Character Designs, sprites, and title screen were done by mothpile.

Backgrounds were done by amelia

Programming by watet3953 and bonkybub

Writing by cyanlastride, indiana, and bonkybub.

Voices were done by these guys ^
